approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

acceptOwnership.description: Accepts ownership of the contract from the nominated owner.

nominateNewOwner.description: Nominate a new owner for the contract.

setUseDELEGATECALL.description: Sets whether DELEGATECALL should be used.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of the token.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimals used by the token.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

balanceOf.description: Returns the balance of a given account.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

nominatedOwner.description: Returns the address of the nominated owner.

allowance.description: Returns the amount of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw from the owner.

_emit.description: Emits an event with the given call data and topics.

acceptOwnership.description: Accepts ownership of the contract from the nominated owner.

Transfer.description: Emitted when tokens are transferred from one address to another.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender to withdraw tokens.

TargetUpdated.description: Emitted when the target address is updated.

OwnerNominated.description: Emitted when a new owner is nominated.

OwnerChanged.description: Emitted when the contract ownership is changed.
